---
title: "payment_intent_event.json"
---

## High-level description
This JSON file represents a Stripe event for a successful payment intent. It contains detailed information about the payment intent, including its status, amount, currency, and associated metadata.

## Symbols

### Root Object
#### Description
The root object represents a Stripe event related to a payment intent.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| id | string | Unique identifier for the event |
| object | string | Type of object, in this case, "event" |
| api_version | string | Version of the Stripe API used |
| created | integer | Unix timestamp of when the event was created |
| data | object | Contains the payment intent object |
| livemode | boolean | Indicates whether this is a live transaction or test mode |
| pending_webhooks | integer | Number of pending webhooks for this event |
| request | object | Information about the API request that triggered the event |
| type | string | Type of the event, in this case, "payment_intent.succeeded" |

### data.object
#### Description
This object represents the payment intent associated with the event.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| id | string | Unique identifier for the payment intent |
| object | string | Type of object, in this case, "payment_intent" |
| amount | integer | Amount of the payment in cents |
| currency | string | Currency of the payment |
| client_secret | string | Secret used to handle the payment intent on the client-side |
| status | string | Status of the payment intent, in this case, "success" |
| metadata | object | Additional metadata associated with the payment intent |

#### Internal Logic
The payment intent object contains detailed information about the payment, including:
- Payment method options and types
- Capture method
- Confirmation method
- Associated charges (empty in this case)
- Customer information (null in this case)
- Various other fields related to the payment process

## Dependencies
This JSON file doesn't have direct dependencies, but it represents data from the Stripe API.

## Configuration
The file doesn't contain configuration options, but it does include API version information:
| Option | Type | Default | Description |
|:-------|:-----|:--------|:------------|
| api_version | string | "2020-08-27" | Version of the Stripe API used for this event |

## API/Interface Reference
While this file doesn't define an API, it represents data from the Stripe API. The event type "payment_intent.succeeded" indicates that this data would be sent as a webhook payload when a payment intent succeeds.

| Endpoint | Method | Request | Response | Description |
|:---------|:-------|:--------|:---------|:------------|
| N/A | POST | N/A | This JSON payload | Webhook payload for a successful payment intent |

Note: The actual endpoint would be configured in the Stripe dashboard or API for webhook delivery.
